pl.edu.pw.tele.enigma

Class Enigma

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.edu.pw.tele.enigma.Enigma
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EnigmaInterface

    public class Enigma
extends Object
implements EnigmaInterface
    Java class that acts as ENIGMA machine.
    Used JAVA singleton pattern. Please do not change any methods without consulting with design team
    Implements interface Enigma Interface.
    Author:
    Lukasz Sedek, Marcin Toczko

    • Field Detail

      • log

        Logger log
        LOG4J

      • instance

        private static volatile Enigma instance
        Signleton instance

      • alphabet

        protected ArrayList<String> alphabet
        variable which stores alphabet for whole application.
        This is used for reference for others alphabets within this application.
        Do not change that

      • reflector

        protected Reflector reflector
        Variable for reflector. This is enigma's style term.
        If you dont know what is that, please read wikipedia

      • rotor1

        Rotor rotor1
        Rotor number 1. This is constant variable. Unfortunately we dont support multiple rotors.
        Rotor is enigma's term.

      • rotor2

        Rotor rotor2
        Rotor number 2. This is constant variable. Unfortunately we dont support multiple rotors.
        Rotor is enigma's term.

      • rotor3

        Rotor rotor3
        Rotor number 3. This is constant variable. Unfortunately we dont support multiple rotors.
        Rotor is enigma's term.

        private Enigma()
        Singleton-like design. We secured access to default constructor

        public static Enigma getInstance()
